content: I orchestrate my mornings to the rhythm of yoga.
author: Terri Guillemets

content: Adventure in life is good; consistency in practice even better.
author: Justina Chen

content: To me, the scent of calm after yoga is one of the greatest inventions.
author: Hugh Jackman

content: Science may never come up with a better stress-relief system than the yoga mat.
author: Earl Wilson

content: Behind every peaceful person is a substantial amount of yoga.
author: Unknown
